name: Ivy v. Morath
question: Can a relationship between private and public actors that does not rise to the level of an express contractual relationship still qualify as a “service, program, or activity” of the state such that it creates obligations to comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act?
description: A case in which the Court will determine whether a relationship between private and public actors that does not rise to the level of an express contractual relationship can still qualify as a “service, program, or activity” of the state such that it creates obligations to comply with the Americans with Disabilities Act.
